  • Previous Coffee Shop Reviews

    I previously wrote a great deal of things for the UTD Mercury, but for easy reading this is a collection of reviews I did for “The Fix”, a coffee shop review column that I’ll be continuing under the name “Practical Caffeine Spots” because:

    1. The Mercury owns the rights to “The Fix” and
    2. Someone else is continuing that particular column there and
    3. I don’t particularly care about having a catchy title for a personal writing project.
